column4: i need install wxwidgets from apt.wxwidgets.org so i have only dapper-wx/ & edgy-wx/ & etch-wx/ & feisty-wx/ & gutsy-wx/ & hardy-wx/ but my dis is intrepid, so i want ask what i can install in my system ?
ubuntu doesn't make those software packages
i ask only if i can use edgy in intrepid, that's all ?
